The seven people who are worthy of offer: A person who meditates observing suffering in all conditions
A person who practices the path to the ending of defilements
A person who has attained the ending of defilements
A person who practices the path to the ending of rebirth
A person who has attained the ending of rebirth
A person who has developed the four absorptions
A person who has developed the six higher knowledges
